happy.quote: You deserve happiness and everything that comes with it.
You are a walking ray of sunshine,and you shine brighter each day!
Happiness is an inside job,accessorise as you should
Slay today like its your redcarpet!
Joy looks good on you babe!

excited.quote: Excitement is truly your skincare-cause you're glowing!

loved.quote: I'm so happy for you,you deserve all the love in the world!
Cherish the love and grow it in good places.
Love is special just like you are
True love makes the universe richer. Glad you have it

bored.quote: Boredom is just the universe telling you to get on your zoom!
You're too glam to be sitting around,do some makeup or start some drama, anything.
Are you bored or just resting from carrying all that beauty around all day?

sad.quote: Wipe those tears babe, your mascara is to expensive for this
Its okay to feel sad but dont forget- you are loved and cherished beyond your understanding

angry.quote: Anger doesn't even match your outfit girl,let it go!
Wear some more lipgloss and move on. Anger doesn't make you any prettier babe
Breathe queen, dont let anyone kill your vibe
Your peace is too expensive to be distubed,fix it ASAP!

frustrated.quote: Breathe, fix your crown, and handle it like the queen you are.
Pause,reset, and remind yourself that you're that girl!
Frustration is normal, just dont let it dim your sparkle
Frustration is your inner boss telling you to level up
You didnt come this far to give up adjust your vibe and keep slaying
